mapper.select: SELECT o.op_id, pr.production_id, cu.cust_name, pd.product_name, co.cont_qty, pd.product_qty, pr.production_date, co.due_date, o.op_process, o.op_date, o.op_emp FROM production pr LEFT JOIN product pd ON pr.product_id = pd.product_id LEFT JOIN out_product o ON pd.product_id = o.product_id LEFT JOIN contract co ON o.cont_id = co.cont_id LEFT JOIN customer cu ON co.cust_id = cu.cust_id;
